QuestData.Title: Gjalerbron Attack Plans
QuestData.Description: These plans detail an imminent attack upon Westguard Keep. It would appear that the frost wyrm, Glacion, who circles overhead is to be used for the offensive.$B$BSurely Mage-Lieutenant Malister would be of some assistance in this matter. Deliver the plans to him at the keep to the south.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Gjalerbron Attack Plans to Mage-Lieutenant Malister at Westguard Keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: What?! Plans for an attack upon the keep?$B$BA FROST WYRM?!!!
QuestData.RewardText: $n, we can't let this come to pass!
